akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1776. Omitted Editorial Notes Codification Section, Pub. L. 103–444, § 2, Nov. 2, 1994, 108 Stat. 4632, which set out congressional findings and purposes, was omitted from the Code as being of special and not general application.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Short TitlePub. L. 103–444, § 1, Nov. 2, 1994, 108 Stat. 4632, provided that Pub. L. 103–444, enacting this subchapter, could be cited as the “Crow Boundary Settlement Act of 1994”.
